Friends

class wxExTextFile

Detailed Description

Offers file statistics for elements and keywords.

Used in wxExTextFile to keep statistics like comments and lines of code. These are stored as elements.

Member Function Documentation

const wxString wxExFileStatistics::Get ( ) const [inline]

Gets all items as a string.

All items are returned as a string, with newlines separating items.

long wxExFileStatistics::Get ( const wxString &  key) const

Gets the key, first the elements are tried, if not present, the keywords are tried, if not present 0 is returned.
